thread.section_title: Fabletics Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Fabletics | fabletics.com | 51 of 522
thread.title: Tasha

author: Tasha
title: Tasha
text: The clothing is good quality that does not stretch over time. Some of the colors fade and bleaching is not an option. I absolutely adore all of the leggings I've received. Some of the tanks are a little on the loose side for me but I choose to wear them when I'm lounging instead of working out. I love that "my outfits" are based on style preferences and sizes that I've selected. There's nothing worse than finding that perfect outfit just to realize that they are sold out of your size.
